name: Norgame. Город полярной ночи
description:
Help the moon girl defeat the ancient monster that stole the sun. The action in a fabulous adventure puzzle game takes place in the scenery of the polar cities of Norilsk and Dudinka under the mysterious light of the Aurora borealis.

  • The world: The world is based on fairy tales of the northern peoples of Russia, urban legends and myths in the scenery of the polar cities of Norilsk and Dudinka. The whole action takes place on a polar night under the mysterious light of the aurora borealis.
  • Plot: Moon girl fights with an ancient monster who stole the sun. Birds and animals come to the rescue, just as everyone wants to achieve the end of the polar night.
  • Puzzles: The game has a lot of puzzles, riddles, search for objects. Use the light! Only light can resist darkness!
  • Graphics: All backgrounds and characters are handmade in papier mache technique, which creates a unique visual style.
  • Music: Atmospheric game music. Also, at some levels, music affects the passage, there are musical puzzles in the game.
